entities.name: minerva mcgonagall
entities.description: Professor McGonagall is introduced as a superior and disdainful character who is also the headmistress. She is mentioned in the conversation with Umbridge, where she says 'You are raving' to Potter.

entities.name: cornelius fudge
entities.description: Fudge is mentioned as someone who should be replaced by Dumbledore. He is not directly involved in the conversation, but his name is used as a point of comparison.

entities.name: albus dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore is mentioned as someone who should replace Fudge. He is not directly involved in the conversation, but his name is used as a point of comparison.

entities.name: harry potter
entities.description: Potter is mentioned as someone who has a career consultation with McGonagall. He is also the one who is being addressed by Umbridge in the conversation.

entities.name: umbridge
entities.description: Umbridge is introduced as a character who is shouting at McGonagall and addressing Potter. She is described as 'still breathing as though she had just run a race'.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is mentioned as someone who whispers to Harry in the Defense Against the Dark Arts lesson. She is not directly involved in the conversation with McGonagall and Umbridge.

relationships.description: Umbridge and McGonagall are shouting at each other in the corridor. This is described as an argument.
Umbridge addresses Potter in the conversation, saying 'Harry, I hope you've thought better of what you were planning to do'.
